attacks.name: Snow Cloak
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Hypnotic Blizzard
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
